title: LFT - Active Daily
body:
Plat V looking for active team that plays daily, Not really concerned about rank as long as you're active.

Adc main, but don't mind playing any required position.

Hit me up here, Or add me in game!

~Sparkle

replies.body:
Hey man if you want you can join our team I'm not 100% your going to get ADC but your most welcome to join our team we consist of plats and golds

http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/team-recruitment/MIAPlElt-looking-for-goldplat-players-from-season-4-and-willing-to-start-a-semi-serious-ranked-team?sort_type=recent
